summary: The interlocking lives and loves of six New Yorkers.
cast: Penny Balfour|Edward Burns|Michael Leydon Campbell|Nadia Dajani|Rosario Dawson|Kathleen Doyle|Dennis Farina|Heather Graham|Leah Gray|Timothy Jerome|David Krumholtz|Libby Langdon|Alicia Meer|Brittany Murphy|Ted Neustadt|Callie Thorne|Stanley Tucci|Aida Turturro|Sara Colton|Jason Kirsch|Brooke Marie Procida
title: Las aceras de Nueva York
